titleStmt.title: The Examination of Sir Ralph Hopton, Sir Iohn Winter, Sir John Stowell with two other knights upon their knees at the barre in the House of Commons the 14 day of this instant October : with the articles of high treason exhibited against them by the House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
